verses.verse: And Abraham <S%H85><s%> was old, <S%H2204><s%> and well stricken <S%H935><s%> in age: <S%H3117><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had blessed <S%H1288><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> things.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his oldest <S%H2205><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> that ruled <S%H4910><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> that he had, Put, <S%H7760><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, your hand <S%H3027><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> my thigh: <S%H3409><s%>

And I will make you swear <S%H7650><s%> by the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> that you shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to my son <S%H1121><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I dwell: <S%H3427><s%>
But you shall go <S%H3212><s%> to my country, <S%H776><s%> and to my kindred, <S%H4138><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to my son <S%H1121><s%> Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Peradventure <S%H194><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> will not be willing <S%H14><s%> to follow <S%H3212><s%> <S%H310><s%> me to this <S%H2063><s%> land: <S%H776><s%> must I needs <S%H7725><s%> bring <S%H7725><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> from from where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you came? <S%H3318><s%>
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Beware <S%H8104><s%> you that you bring <S%H7725><s%> not my son <S%H1121><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> which <S%H834><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> me from my father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and from the land <S%H776><s%> of my kindred, <S%H4138><s%> and which <S%H834><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, and that swore <S%H7650><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> To your seed <S%H2233><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> he shall send <S%H7971><s%> his angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and you shall take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to my son <S%H1121><s%> from there. <S%H8033><s%>

And if the woman <S%H802><s%> will not be willing <S%H14><s%> to follow <S%H3212><s%> <S%H310><s%> you, then you shall be clear <S%H5352><s%> from this my oath: <S%H7621><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> bring <S%H7725><s%> not my son <S%H1121><s%> thither again. <S%H7725><s%>

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the thigh <S%H3409><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his master, <S%H113><s%> and swore <S%H7650><s%> to him concerning <S%H5921><s%> that matter. <S%H1697><s%>

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> camels <S%H1581><s%> of the camels <S%H1581><s%> of his master, <S%H113><s%> and departed; <S%H3212><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the goods <S%H2898><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%> were in his hand: <S%H3027><s%> and he arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to Mesopotamia, <S%H763><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> of Nahor. <S%H5152><s%>

And he made his camels <S%H1581><s%> to kneel <S%H1288><s%> down <S%H1288><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> by a well <S%H875><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the evening, <S%H6153><s%> even the time <S%H6256><s%> that women go <S%H3318><s%> out to draw <S%H7579><s%> water.

And he said <S%H559><s%>O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, send <S%H7136><s%> me good speed <S%H7136><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> and show <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> to my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham. <S%H85><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I stand <S%H5324><s%> here by the well <S%H5869><s%> of water; <S%H4325><s%> and the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> out to draw <S%H7579><s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

And let it come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that the damsel <S%H5291><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> I shall say, <S%H559><s%> Let <S%H5186><s%> down <S%H5186><s%> your pitcher, <S%H3537><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, that I may drink; <S%H8354><s%> and she shall say, <S%H559><s%> Drink, <S%H8354><s%> and I will give your camels <S%H1581><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> also: <S%H1571><s%> let the same be she that you have appointed <S%H3198><s%> for your servant <S%H5650><s%> Isaac; <S%H3327><s%> and thereby shall I know <S%H3045><s%> that you have showed <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> to my master. <S%H113><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, before <S%H2962><s%> he had done <S%H3615><s%> speaking, <S%H1696><s%> that, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out, who <S%H834><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> to Bethuel, <S%H1328><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> Abraham's <S%H85><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> with her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> on her shoulder. <S%H7926><s%>

And the damsel <S%H5291><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> fair <S%H2896><s%> to look <S%H4758><s%> on, a virgin, <S%H1330><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> had any man <S%H376><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> her: and she went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the well, <S%H5869><s%> and filled <S%H4390><s%> her pitcher, <S%H3537><s%> and came <S%H5927><s%> up.

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> her, and said, <S%H559><s%> Let me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, drink <S%H1572><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of your pitcher. <S%H3537><s%>

And she said, <S%H559><s%> Drink, <S%H8354><s%> my lord: <S%H113><s%> and she hurried, <S%H4116><s%> and let <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> on her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and gave him drink. <S%H8248><s%>

And when she had done <S%H3615><s%> giving him drink, <S%H8248><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> I will draw <S%H7579><s%> water for your camels <S%H1581><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H515><s%> they have done <S%H3615><s%> drinking. <S%H8354><s%>

And she hurried, <S%H4116><s%> and emptied <S%H6168><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the trough, <S%H8268><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> to the well <S%H875><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%> water, and drew <S%H7579><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> his camels. <S%H1581><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> wondering <S%H7583><s%> at her held <S%H2790><s%> his peace, <S%H2790><s%> to wit <S%H3045><s%> whether the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had made <S%H6743><s%> his journey <S%H1870><s%> prosperous <S%H6743><s%> or not.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as the camels <S%H1581><s%> had done <S%H3615><s%> drinking, <S%H8354><s%> that the man <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a golden <S%H2091><s%> earring <S%H5141><s%> of half <S%H1235><s%> a shekel <S%H1235><s%> weight, <S%H4948><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> for her hands <S%H3027><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels weight <S%H4948><s%> of gold; <S%H2091><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> Whose <S%H4310><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> are you? tell <S%H5046><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you: is there room <S%H4725><s%> in your father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> for us to lodge <S%H3885><s%> in?

And she said <S%H559><s%> to him, I am the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> which <S%H834><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Nahor. <S%H5152><s%>
She said <S%H559><s%> moreover to him, We have both <S%H1571><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> and provender <S%H4554><s%> enough, <S%H7227><s%> and room <S%H4725><s%> to lodge <S%H3885><s%> in.
And the man <S%H376><s%> bowed <S%H6915><s%> down <S%H6915><s%> his head, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has not left <S%H5800><s%> destitute <S%H5800><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> of his mercy <S%H2617><s%> and his truth: <S%H571><s%> I being in the way, <S%H1870><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> led <S%H5148><s%> me to the house <S%H1004><s%> of my master's <S%H113><s%> brothers. <S%H251><s%>
And the damsel <S%H5291><s%> ran, <S%H7323><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> them of her mother's <S%H517><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things. <S%H1697><s%>

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> had a brother, <S%H251><s%> and his name <S%H8034><s%> was Laban: <S%H3837><s%> and Laban <S%H3837><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> out to the man, <S%H376><s%> to the well. <S%H5869><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when he saw <S%H7200><s%> the earring <S%H5141><s%> and bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on his sister's <S%H269><s%> hands, <S%H3027><s%> and when he heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his sister, <S%H269><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> to me; that he came <S%H935><s%> to the man; <S%H376><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he stood <S%H5975><s%> by the camels <S%H1581><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the well. <S%H5869><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Come <S%H935><s%> in, you blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> you without? <S%H2351><s%> for I have prepared <S%H6437><s%> the house, <S%H1004><s%> and room <S%H4725><s%> for the camels. <S%H1581><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into the house: <S%H1004><s%> and he ungirded <S%H6605><s%> his camels, <S%H1581><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> and provender <S%H4554><s%> for the camels, <S%H1581><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> to wash <S%H7364><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%> and the men's <S%H582><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> that were with him.

And there was set <S%H7760><s%> meat before <S%H6440><s%> him to eat: <S%H398><s%> but he said, <S%H559><s%> I will not eat, <S%H398><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H515><s%> I have told <S%H1696><s%> my errand. <S%H1697><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Speak <S%H1696><s%> on.
And he said, <S%H559><s%> I am Abraham's <S%H85><s%> servant. <S%H5650><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> greatly; <S%H3966><s%> and he is become <S%H1431><s%> great: <S%H1431><s%> and he has given <S%H5414><s%> him flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and herds, <S%H1241><s%> and silver, <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> and menservants, <S%H5650><s%> and maidservants, <S%H8198><s%> and camels, <S%H1581><s%> and asses. <S%H2543><s%>

And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> my master's <S%H113><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> to my master <S%H113><s%> when <S%H310><s%> she was old: <S%H2209><s%> and to him has he given <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he has.

And my master <S%H113><s%> made me swear, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> You shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to my son <S%H1121><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> land <S%H776><s%> I dwell: <S%H3427><s%>
But you shall go <S%H3212><s%> to my father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and to my kindred, <S%H4940><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to my son. <S%H1121><s%>
And I said <S%H559><s%> to my master, <S%H113><s%> Peradventure <S%H194><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> will not follow <S%H3212><s%> <S%H310><s%> me.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, The LORD, <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I walk, <S%H1980><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> his angel <S%H4397><s%> with you, and prosper <S%H6743><s%> your way; <S%H1870><s%> and you shall take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> of my kindred, <S%H4940><s%> and of my father's <S%H1><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shall you be clear <S%H5352><s%> from this my oath, <S%H423><s%> when you come <S%H935><s%> to my kindred; <S%H4940><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> they give <S%H5414><s%> not you one, you shall be clear <S%H5355><s%> from my oath. <S%H423><s%>

And I came <S%H935><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to the well, <S%H5869><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> if <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> you do prosper <S%H6743><s%> my way <S%H1870><s%> which I go: <S%H1980><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I stand <S%H5324><s%> by the well <S%H5869><s%> of water; <S%H4325><s%> and it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that when the virgin <S%H5959><s%> comes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%> water, and I say <S%H559><s%> to her, Give me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of your pitcher <S%H3537><s%> to drink; <S%H8248><s%>

And she say <S%H559><s%> to me, Both drink <S%H8354><s%> you, and I will also <S%H1571><s%> draw <S%H7579><s%> for your camels: <S%H1581><s%> let the same be the woman <S%H802><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has appointed <S%H3198><s%> out for my master's <S%H113><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

And before <S%H2962><s%> I had done <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> in my heart, <S%H3820><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> with her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> her shoulder; <S%H7926><s%> and she went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the well, <S%H5869><s%> and drew <S%H7579><s%> water: and I said <S%H559><s%> to her, Let me drink, <S%H8248><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you.

And she made haste, <S%H4116><s%> and let <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> from her shoulder, and said, <S%H559><s%> Drink, <S%H8354><s%> and I will give your camels <S%H1581><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> also: <S%H1571><s%> so I drank, <S%H8354><s%> and she made the camels <S%H1581><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> also. <S%H1571><s%>

And I asked <S%H7592><s%> her, and said, <S%H559><s%> Whose <S%H4310><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> are you? And she said, <S%H559><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Bethuel, <S%H1328><s%> Nahor's <S%H5152><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Milcah <S%H4435><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to him: and I put <S%H7760><s%> the earring <S%H5141><s%> on her face, <S%H639><s%> and the bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on her hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And I bowed <S%H6915><s%> down <S%H6915><s%> my head, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had led <S%H5148><s%> me in the right <S%H571><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> my master's <S%H113><s%> brother's <S%H251><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> to his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And now <S%H6258><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you will deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> and truly <S%H571><s%> with my master, <S%H113><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me: and if <S%H518><s%> not, tell <S%H5046><s%> me; that I may turn <S%H6437><s%> to the right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> or <S%H176><s%> to the left. <S%H8040><s%>

Then Laban <S%H3837><s%> and Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> The thing <S%H1697><s%> proceeds <S%H3318><s%> from the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> we cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to you bad <S%H7451><s%> or <S%H176><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%>
